version_description: - Improved sharing features
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

- added italian language
- now using auto-renewable payments
- bug fixes and stability improvements

- translation updates
- widget background fix

Purely a bugfix release, including the following fixes:
- empty account problem
- entry being save without account defined
- unable to save entry
- remaining categories budget now adjusts to foreign currencies
- display error if user adds a repeat with end date before start
- budget limit now adheres to planned flag

Spring time*. Why should only the flowers blossom? Here are some flowers from the Toshl monster's gardens.

- general style update with fresher colors
- easier to read expense and income lists, with description previews and days of the week
- refreshed Monthly overview and River flow graphs
- budget list with better grouping and today indicators on all budgets
- better looking entry and budget details
- support and tutorials are now easier to access

Would you like to see a bug/feature listed here? Send us an email to support@toshl.com and we'll see what we can do. Or you know, just write to say hi.

*Our apologies in advance to users in the Southern Hemisphere who are not experiencing spring at the moment.

This is purely a bug-fix release. It includes the following fixes:
- budget list design and sorting updates based on feedback
- budget list crash
- budget details crash for daily budgets
- budgets being reported as underspent when actually overspent
- riverflow refresh bug

Would you like to see a bug/feature listed here? Send us an email to support@toshl.com and we'll see what we can do. Or you know, just write to say hi.

- Added 2-factor authentication when logging in. You can enable it in the web app on toshl.com in the user settings (Me).
- Toshl monsters from Florence snuck in hints of major new features to come. Can you find them?

Would you like to see a bug/feature listed here? Send us an email to support@toshl.com and we'll see what we can do. Or you know, just write to say hi.

Release notes:
- Toshl can now connect to US banks, credit cards and other financial services. Your expenses and incomes will be automatically imported and categorised as they happen. More countries and banks will be added in future updates.
- Connection to the Bitstamp cryptocurrency exchange.
- New Toshl Medici upgrade plan which enables the bank connections.
- Main menu now looks waaay cooler.
- Easier balance reconciliation for manual financial accounts. Set the balance you want, Toshl does the rest.
- Set a custom balance limit on a financial account. You'll get a notification when you approach or surpass that limit.
- Financial accounts can now be deleted from the mobile app.
- Lots of minor improvements and bug fixes.

Would you like to see a bug/feature listed here? Send us an email to support@toshl.com and we'll see what we can do. Or, you know, just write to say hi.

This version includes:
- added new cryptocurrency exchanges you can connect to with Toshl Medici. Bitfinex and Coinbase are now available in addition to the previously available Bitstamp
- when adding a new bank connection, you can now set the date from which onward you'd like the data imported
- better automatic reporting when contacting support
- River flow color correction for planned flow
- other bug fixes and improvements

- fixed forgot password function
- minor updates and fixes
- fixed a crash from previous release, sorry about that

This version includes:
- minor updates and fixes

Fixes the nasty duplication bug that plagued previous versions (thanks to all the people that reported this issue). If you were affected by it, please reinstall this version and the problem will be solved. Sorry about that!

- Added support for PDF attachments.
- Fixed login support for password managers.
- Hopefully fixed a few lingering issues with occasional crashes.

Would you like to see a bug/feature listed here? Send us an email to support@toshl.com and we'll see what we can do. Or, you know, just write to say hi.

This version includes:
- Planning graphs with month-to-month comparisons of monthly balances, expenses, incomes and net worth
- fix for custom exchange rates resetting to 1 in rare cases when adding an expense
- minor improvements and fixes

Added support for 3000 new bank connections around the world, bringing the total to more than 12 000. Automatic bank connections are available in many more countries, including Australia, Brazil, Germany, Hong Kong, Israel, Italy, Mexico, Singapore, United Kingdom and many more countries.

Sign up for the Toshl Medici free 30 day trial to try them out.

- my financial month setting is now available in the app
- entries on automatic accounts can be deleted
- reminder option to update semi-automatic bank connections
- minor bug fixes and improvements
- minor improvements and bug fixes
- minor improvements and bug fixes

- Splitting entries. For example, take that one big Food & Drinks purchase and split them among several categories or tags. Also useful when splitting purchases with friends. Works with any currency. Just tap "Split" on entry details.

- Easier transfer matching. When an expense is really a transfer, but wasn't detected automatically, just open the entry details and tap "Make transfer". Toshl will suggest potential entry matches or financial accounts the transfer should go to.

- Budget periods can now be edited individually. The option "just this budget period" has been added when saving budget modifications.

- Added new bank connections, now supporting more than 13 000 automatic bank connections worldwide. More coming soon, including Revolut.

- Many minor improvements and bug fixes.

- Fixed a crash which happened after splitting an entry
- Updated bank connection system for US and Canadian banks and credit cards

- New iOS 13 style of tabs on entry lists and planning

- bug fix for passcode lock
- bug fix for facebook login
